# Text-based formats

## Challenge:

Write code to read in a file from a file named `mydata.csv` located in your project's `data` folder.

<details>
<summary>Solution</summary>

```r
# Read a CSV file
data <- read.csv("data/mydata.csv")
head(data)
```
